nodes.text: Phew, am I glad to be outta there.
That was a close one!
When the going gets rough, the rough get going!
I didn't run away - I just retreated in order to regroup and retaliate.
Is the Good Master all right?
Fine, I'm fine... I just needed to catch my breath a little.

nodes.message: Gregor is short so the standard 1.25 height doesn't apply to him.

nodes.text: Greetings, Young Master! To the University Store, Gregor welcomes you.
I am Gregor - Gregor is my name. How may Gregor serve the Young Master?
These are lovely Drats, Mistress Esme! Splendid, luscious, fat Drats! Much thanks to you Gregor gives you. Mistress Esme is a mighty hunter!
You are most velcome, Gregor. I am happy to hunt Drats for you.
Ah, Young Master Shawn! Welcome! Mistress Esme has just brought me a fine catch of fresh Drats! Gregor could not hope for a better set.
Here is vat I catch for you today, Gregor.
These are fine, succulent Drats, Mistress Esme. No one hunts faster or better than my Mistress Esme!
But Mistress Esme is not happy! Why is Mistress Esme so sad? The hunt went very well. Did Mistress Esme get hurt? Is that why Mistress Esme is distressed?
(sigh) Is nothing, Gregor. I am just vorried about grades. I vould not vant to have to leave this school.
Mistress Esme must not leave the school... Mistress Esme is best hunter of all! Please, please, good Mistress Esme, do not be sad. Mistress Esme is too good to leave.
Ah, Good Master Shawn! Please, tell Mistress Esme that she is too good to leave this school! Do not let her be sad!
Ah, Good Master! Glad is Gregor to see you!
Has my Good Master come to help poor Gregor as Mistress Esme is doing?
The foul Warrior Drats have taken over the Wine Cellar! These vile creatures must be stopped!
They are not nearly as tasty and sweet as true Drats.
Good Master! Have you come to save poor Gregor from the wicked, nasty, mean Drat Queen? Her Minions plague the school - and Gregor dares not leave this store or the Warrior Drats might eat Gregor!
Ah! Good Master! The Warrior Drats are gone! Gregor no longer fears for his whiskers and tail! Is this not a joyous day?
The Young Master returns! So glad is Gregor to see you again!
Gregor has surprise for Master Shawn! Gregor has new goods for sale by request of the Master Rogue!
This is most wonderful! Gregor has special thing to sell to Master Shawn!
New things for sale! Magical things from Professor Featherstonehaugh! Gregor hopes that Master Shawn will find them exciting.
Young Master is very brave to be out and about during the Nights of the Dead. Poor Gregor feels very scared.
So good to see the Young Master again. Do you need anything for your Disbarred Bards class?
Ah! Gregor has something in store just for the Disbarred Bards - a Rope and Grapnel set.
So, Gregor, vhat really is behind the "Very Dangerous" door? Vhat are you hiding?
Mistress Esme, please, I assure you - Gregor hides nothing! Gregor only knows that Dire Rats are afraid to go near that door, and so is Gregor.
Vhy are you afraid? I know that it smells nasty there, but no more than rest of Vine Cellar. I do not hear anything there. So why do you think it is dangerous?
Ah, look! Master Shawn is here! So good to see you, Young Master.
